sentence: Fifth trip to Las Vegas and definately the last
We will definitely stay there on any future visits and recommend it to all friends and family
Luckily this experience did not put a downer on our holiday for the rest of our time we met some lovely people experienced exciting day trips and overall had a great time
I took my family and really had a great time
My family and I came out for my birthday
We had a wonderful time with family
90 rooms displaced during the New Year holiday
Great for weekend getaway
We stayed there over the July 4th holiday
A good family vegas resort
This was my final trip to the flamingo
I u derstand that it was a holiday weekend but you should have been able to organize everything as you go through these busy season every year
I had makeup and clothing stolen and that ’s what I know of on this trip
During my most recent trip I stayed at the flamingo

we went to the buffet at The Mirage as they give veterans and spouses a 40 percent discount which is very nice I do n’t believe Flamingo does that our room was nice as we had one of the remodeled ones I also do n’t like the salespeople that are close to the elevators constantly trying to talk to you it ’s just a little annoying and as guests we really do n’t need that if we are on vacation I have not seen that at other Total Rewards properties we have stayed at
Ruined my staycation with my kids n wife
my favorite channel there had 80s 90s movies all day long I never got bored of the television while on vacation
I would have expected a lot more from the hotel we have come back to year after year with our family for celebrations and shows and just to relax
They have really kept up with the times and cater to all age groups
Thinking of making another trip in February for my 50th
The Flamingo was our first stop on a 10 day Southwest road trip
Explained I was getting into shower but was meeting family for brunch and would be out of room at noon and they acknowledged which would give them opportunity to replace without me disturbing them
Not one of our favorite casinos the Flamingo is still one we visit nearly every trip we make to Vegas
One downside is that there are no water fountains and you pretty much end up spending a lot on water if you are staying with family
We have stayed at the Flamingo our past two trips to Vegas but our rooms this time were not appealing
As well the suggesting that I should spend any of my vacation time waiting on engineering to come fix the myriad of issues was appalling
I tripped in it Monday night Jan 13th and bruised up my forearm and hand and jammed my shoulder
Rent a car from the airport and drive to the Canyon rather than the tourist trip busses much cheaper and amazing views
I took my mom for a two day trip to the Flamingo and this was the worst experience ever I will never go back to the Flamingo
that is a fair comments since you asked me to rate you at Trip Advisor
